item.title: Github: Working With multiple SSH Keys
item.description: In this post, I will be discussing how to work with multiple github accounts and setup SSH keys for each account. Let’s talk about steps on a broader level: Generate SSH keys for individual github account. Informing the github accounts about the keys. Testing the connection. Generate SSH keys for individual github account. To generate a SSH key, we can run ssh-keygen -t <ALGORITHM> -C <COMMENT> -f <FILE_NAME> in the terminal.
